testInfo.name: Тест по условным предложениям английского языка

questions.question: Which conditional is used for general truths?
Choose the correct form: If it rains, we ___ cancel the picnic.
Fill in the blank: If you heat water to 100°C, it ___ (boil).
Which conditional talks about unreal present situations?
Fill in the blank: If I ___ (be) you, I would study more.
Choose the correct form: If I had known, I ___ told you.
Fill in the blank: If she ___ (study) harder, she would pass the exam.
Which conditional is used for past unreal situations?
Fill in the blank: If you ___ (call) me, I will help you.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: If I win the lottery, I would buy a house.
If I win the lottery, I will buy a house.
If I won the lottery, I will buy a house.
If I won the lottery, I buy a house.
questions.correctAnswer: If I win the lottery, I will buy a house.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: If I ___ (have) more time, I would travel more.
What is the structure of Third Conditional?
options: If + past perfect, would have + past participle
questions.correctAnswer: If + past perfect, would have + past participle

questions.question: Fill in the blank: If he ___ (not miss) the bus, he wouldn't have been late.
Choose the correct form: If you touch fire, you ___ burned.
Fill in the blank: If they ___ (invite) us, we would have come.
